query:
UPDATE kafka_trigger
        SET
            kafka_resource_path = $1,
            group_id = $2,
            topics = $3,
            script_path = $4,
            path = $5,
            is_flow = $6,
            edited_by = $7,
            email = $8,
            edited_at = now(),
            server_id = NULL,
            error = NULL,
            error_handler_path = $11,
            error_handler_args = $12,
            retry = $13
        WHERE
            workspace_id = $9 AND path = $10
